mapper.insert: insert into jumei.jm_bt_images ( channel_id, image_key, image_type, image_type_extend, image_index, origin_url, jm_url, syn_flg, created, creater, modified, modifier) values ( #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageTypeExtend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
